snippet.title: PBA Basketball Slam: Arcade Edition / Trailer  [Steam - Early Access]
snippet.description:
Hey guys! PBA Basketball Slam: Arcade Edition is now available on Steam! Play up to 4 players on local or online using Steam Remote Play!

Steam page link:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1372990/PBA_Basketball_Slam_Arcade_Edition/

--------------------------------------------
PBA Basketball Slam: Arcade Edition is a 2-on-2 arcade-style full court basketball game with no rules and where anything goes. It features epic moves, high-flying dunks, a unique mix of fun, and gameplay experience inspired by the 1990’s basketball arcade game NBA Jam.

Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/pbaslamgame

Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/PBAslam

Join us on Discord: 
https://discord.gg/h6VpXE

#PBAonSteam #2on2ArcadeBasketball #VirtualPBA
